agendarServicios.actualizarHoraIni: Update the initial time, it cannot be greater than the current date.

agendarServicios.valCitasCaducadas: Appointments in red are prior to the current date.

agendarServicios.valCitasTraslape: Appointments in red are no longer available for scheduling at the selected time.
agendarServicios.valCitasTraslapeSuc: Appointments in red overlap with the branch's closing time.

buscar.ubicacionInvalida: Activate your device's location to perform searches.
buscar.ingresaBusqueda: Enter the description or company to Search
buscar.busquedaVacia: No search results were found for the entered search.
buscar.infoBusquedas: ANDI Services will help you find the service providers you need.
buscar.infoBusquedas1: Search by business name, description, or keywords for what you need.
buscar.infoBusquedas2: Example: barber, cleaning, locksmith, haircut, etc.
buscar.infoBusquedas3: When you finish writing your search, press the Search button.
buscar.infoBusquedas4: If there are results, the tabs will be displayed:
buscar.infoBusquedas5: If no search results are found, the following message will be displayed:
buscar.infoBusquedas6: If your search returns no results, modify the distance range in km or miles in the 'Filters' section.

direcciones.infoDirecciones: Addresses are primarily used when searching for businesses and services in the "Filters" section under "Location", where you can select your current location or the location of important points for you, such as: Grandparents' House, Office, etc., to easily locate businesses that offer the services you need near your registered addresses.

registroCliente.intro1: The best way to find providers, view their services and schedule appointments in a simple, secure and accessible way for everyone.
registroCliente.intro2: ANDI Clients is your intermediary between you, the Client who requires services, and Suppliers, such as trades and professionals who offer their services in their businesses, at home, or online.
registroCliente.intro3: To help improve your experiences and that of your clients, ANDI Services will receive information to ensure better service for you and the entire ANDI community.
registroCliente.intro4: Click the ''I agree, Continue'' button to accept the
registroCliente.deAcuerdoTerminos: I agree to ANDI's Terms and Conditions
registroCliente.img2: ANDI Services ensures the security of both its clients and suppliers, who must provide authenticated information for the safety of all.
registroCliente.img4: You must be at least 18 years of age to register.
registroCliente.id1: ANDI Services is your intermediary between you as a client who requires services and Suppliers, such as trades and professionals who offer their services in their businesses, at home or online.
registroCliente.id2: ANDI Services takes care of the security of both clients and suppliers, who must identify themselves with their real data for greater security for everyone.
registroCliente.id4: You must be at least 18 years of age to register.
